Articles.Content: I am planning a Duna mission using LV-Ns in a cluster with Cubic Octagonal Struts, but there is only one problem: no interstage. I have to make due with struts. It would definitely be cool to have a 2.5m cluster if 3 LV-Ns, a 3.75m cluster of 5 LV-Ns, and possibly a 5m cluster of 9 LV-Ns.
Procedural Fairings and KW Rocketry both include interstage fairing parts. PFairings also has a thrust plate part, which makes it easy to build engine clusters.
Thanks! I forgot about the PF Interstage and Thrust-Plate.
